name: A Baby Horse Run
description:
&#x2605 100% FREE! EVERYTHING UNLOCKED! &#x2605
&#x2605 ADORABLE BABY HORSE GAME! &#x2605

Have fun playing a baby horse on a great big adventure! In this exciting game you have to run and jump your way through this magical world! How far will go you?

COOL STUFF

- Fun theme.
- Cute graphics.
- Easy to play!
